content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: dataset_name
      operator: is_not_contained_by
      value:
        - Domain CT
    - name:
      operator:
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0321
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when a custom domain is present and is not based on of
  the observation classes
Outcome:
  Message: Custom domain is not based on one of the observation classes
Rule Type: Domain Existence Check
Sensitivity: Domain
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0321
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: This section describes the overall process for creating
                  a custom domain, which must be based on one of the three SDTM general
                  observation classes.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: '2.6'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Trigger error when a custom domain is present and is not based on of the observation classes

Outcome.Message: Custom domain is not based on one of the observation classes

Citations.Cited_Guidance: This section describes the overall process for creating a custom domain, which must be based on one of the three SDTM general observation classes.
